UseInspired_Title: Das zweisprachige digitale Lernbuch "Recht auf Gebärdensprache – Die Emanzipationsbewegung von Gehörlosen" vermittelt mit Filmen, historischen Quellen und einem Quizz die Geschichte der Gehörlosenbewegung der Schweiz seit den 1980er Jahren. Interviews mit gehörlosen Aktivistinnen und Aktivisten und ausgewählte Quellen zeigen, mit welchen Diskriminierungserfahrungen gehörlose Menschen konfrontiert waren. Das Tool leuchtet die Anerkennungskämpfe Gehörloser der letzten 40 Jahren aus.

Il s’agit d’un programme en huit séances d’une heure, administré à l’aide de matériel multimédia (visuel et sonore) présenté sous forme de fichiers PowerPoint projetés sur un écran. Les groupes sont composés de 5 à 10 participants.

Software  ParOSol

ParOSol stands for PARallel Octree SOLver.

It is a fully-parallel micro-FE analysis code based on Octree to solve linear elasticity problems. Because it works on equal sized voxel geometry, it solves the problem direct on 3D images, which can be obtained by CT scans.

We developed and promoted the ABCD conference approach

The ABCD Conference format aims to change how conferences, workshops and other meetings can be organised to focus on global inclusivity while minimizing our carbon footprint. UseInspired_Comment: Es hat sich herausgestellt, dass Farbe, Bild und Typografie die zentralen ästhetischen Gestaltungselemente ausmachen. Die Leitlinien veranschaulichen, dass mit Ordnung, Ähnlichkeit und dem Mittelmass, die höchste Attraktivität erzielt wird. In Anlehnung an Wundt und Berlyne beschreiben das Mittelmass und die Ähnlichkeit den Scheitelbereich der umgekehrten U-förmigen Funktion und stehen so für die «Einheit in der Vielfalt» oder das maximale Gefallen.
UseInspired_Title: Leitlinien für die Gestaltung ästhetischer Web-Interfaces

SABRe Sensor Aughmented Bass Clarinet, prototype version III
SABRe extends a bass clarinet with four kinds of electronic sensors in order to capture the player‘s gestures. It is being developed with an instrument maker to fulfill professional quality standards. An independant sub-task of SABRe focuses on a clarinet mouthpiece, which can be used simultaneously as an acoustic mouthpiece as well as a wind controller, sending information about the air pressure in the player‘s mouth.

The Lesionmapping «Driving Licence» (LeDL) is a 60-page manuscript that aims to provide students (i.e. Bachelor, Master, PhD) with the technique of modern lesion delineation and statistical analysis in stroke patients. Developed an energy system model for high penetration of renewable energy for the Western US Interconnection. The model considers coordinated plant siting, design and operation, along with the current transmission network; and it is specifically designed to model the energy system at high spatial and temporal resolution. This is a linear programming model that builds on the Calliope framework, designed to run on high-performance clusters to examine a large number of optimization scenarios.

TAPEEG 'Toolbox for Automated Processing of EEG files'
TAPEEG is Matlab® software for processing EEG/MEG-files. TAPEEG is able to process EEG or MEG files at all needed steps of analysis. A manual allows conducting standard EEG/MEG-processings with the TAPEEG application. For displaying results, the software Cartool is recommended. The code and runtimes (Windows, Linux & MacOS) are developed and released under the GPL license.

The touch-box is an abstract haptic interface affording finger pressing gestures, designed and realized at ICST. The top panel of the interface measures normal force and provides broadband vibration. Several designs were realized to improve accuracy of force measurement and fidelity of vibration feedback. The interface is being used in psychophysical experiments addressing auditory and tactile perception and integration.
UseInspired_Type: Others (e.g. unlicensed products/procedures, prototypes, demonstrators, teaching materials)

UseInspired_Title:
The shear-touch-box is an evolution of the former touch-box implementing accurate measurements of normal force, shear forces along the x and y axes, finger contact area and position on the top panel: The first solution makes use of load cells in a newly developed mechanical structure, while the latter uses an embedded infrared camera-based system and ad hoc developed image analysis routines.
Broadband vibrotactile feedback is provided by means of coil-based actuators.
UseInspired_Type: Others (e.g. unlicensed products/procedures, prototypes, demonstrators, teaching materials)

UseInspired_Title:
An actuated digital piano was developed, where tactile transducers convey vibrations at the keyboard. Sound and vibrotactile feedback are generated via software: A physical-modeling piano synthesizer is used for audio feedback, and a sample-player is used for playing back vibration samples recorded on acoustic pianos or synthetic signals.
Loudness, keyboard dynamics and vibratory response were accurately calibrated matching that of reference acoustic pianos.
UseInspired_Type: Others (e.g. unlicensed products/procedures, prototypes, demonstrators, teaching materials)

UseInspired_Title: The HSoundplane, based on a multi-touch expressive surface controller, is a musical interface that offers multi-point, localized and interactive vibrotactile feedback. Vibration is provided by a matrix of low-cost piezoelectric discs arranged on a self-designed PCB layer, and custom amplifying and control electronics. The interface is currently being refined and tested in a musical context, involving sound designers and performers in the process.
UseInspired_Type: Others (e.g. unlicensed products/procedures, prototypes, demonstrators, teaching materials)

Continuous Assimilation of Integrating Rain Sensors (CAIRS, software)
CAIRS is a framework to reconstruct rain fields by assimilating signals of fundamentally different rain sensors. In particular, the integration characteristics of sensors (e.g. path-averaging microwave links) are explicitly being considered. For example, non-recording standard rain gauges integrate over time and deliver information such as the daily rainfall sums.

The Parsed Corpus of Middle English Poetry (PCMEP). 

The PCMEP is a fully parsed and annotated corpus of Middle English verse texts. Its main goal is to help close the substantial gap in English prose texts between c. 1250 and c. 1350 with available poetic records from the same period. The electronic text files are annotated according to the guidelines of the Penn-Parsed Corpus of Middle English.

TRAP histochemistry provides specific information of osteoclast activity. Wenn Ziegen/ Engadinerschafe mind. 30 Tage im Frühjahr eingezäunt gehalten werden, um eine weitere Verholzung des Weidegebietes zu reduzieren, so kann der Engere Rat einen Beitrag von Fr. 30.- pro Tier ausrichten.

GLOBAL CHARCOAL DATABASE
The aim of the Global Charcoal Database (GCD) is to provide the scientific community with a global paleofire dataset for research and archiving sedimentary records of fire. Global syntheses have enabled the examination of broad-scale patterns in palaeofire activity, created a framework for exploring the linkages among fire, climate and vegetation at centennial-to-multi-millennial time scales and allows evaluation of fire model simulations at regional to global scales.

A database and synthesis of northern peatland soil properties and Holocene carbon and nitrogen accumulation.
It contains the results from the compilation of Holocene peat soil properties with associated carbon and nitrogen accumulation rates for northern peatlands. It consists of 268 peat cores from 215 sites located north of 45°N. It encompasses regions such as the West Siberia Lowlands, the Hudson Bay Lowlands, Kamchatka in Far East Russia, and the Tibetan Plateau.

The R-package abn provides routines to help determine optimal Bayesian network models for a given data set. The core functionality is concerned with model selection - determining the most robust empirical model of data from interdependent variables. Laplace approximations are used to estimate goodness of fit metrics and model parameters. A comprehensive set of documented case studies, numerical accuracy/quality assurance exercises, and additional documentation are available from the abn website.

BFO-Based Ontological Analysis Framework: Definition Annotation Manual (Version 1)
The manual specifies the basic principles for structuring a corpus of terminological definitions, and for implementing the proposed ontological annotation schema in XML.
It provides guidelines for:
-Segmenting natural language definitions into their genus and differentia parts.
-Tagging each segment with an ontological label based on any of the the realist upper-level categories of Basic Formal Ontology (BFO).

The Research Station Jungfraujoch is used as a testing platform for new technologies. Electronic devices (computers, controlling units, storage disks etc.), detector units (for cosmic rays, gas concentrations, meteorology, etc.), medical equipment and building materials are tested to many extremes (very cold temperatures, heavy snowfall, wind velocities up to 200 km/h, reduced atmospheric pressure). The results lead to rugged and robust instrumentation and improvements in building design.

We developed a free on-line training platform for teachers to train their diagnostic competences in assessing students' argumentative texts. We called it BEAST (Become an Expert in Assessing Student Texts). Participants are introduced to the assessment rubrics used in ASSET, and to student texts and writing prompts used the project MEWS. They can then assess these texts and compare their own judgments to benchmark scores by trained experts which were generated in the MEWS study.

UseInspired_Title: The Research Station Jungfraujoch is used as a testing platform for new technologies. The results lead to rugged and robust instrumentation and improvements in building design.

The long-term use of scientific or monitoring equipment at remote alpine sites is confined to the vicinity of permanent installations or to available mobile energy sources. Methanol based fuel cells are not only small and safe to handle but also provide a fair amount of energy. Teaming fuel cells with solar panels and batteries seems to be a sensible approach to a fail-safe power supply for unattended measuring campaigns in remote areas.

The Varve Image Portal by PAGES' Varves Working Group is an online resource summarizing existing varve images around the world. It includes examples of seasonal sedimentary successions, specific sediment components and structures of varved sediments. Different varve types from all continents are visualised by macroscopic, microscopic and X-radiographic images with corresponding metadata. Users can also contribute to the portal.

The MadGraph5_aMC@NLO framework, and in particular one of its key components MadLoop5, was publicly released and improved during my EPM fellowship. 
This open-source program allows for the precise simulation of high-energy collision events (in the Standard Model and beyond).
As evidenced by the high citation count of its reference publication, MadGraph5_aMC@NLO is a well-established tool widely used by both theorists and the large experimental collaborations ATLAS and CMS of the LHC at CERN.

Electromyographic-Prosthesis Interface.
I have developed and implemented a low-cost, neurophysiological interface that grants amputees volitional control over their powered ankle-foot prosthesis (AFP). 
•	single-board computer (RasperryPi)
•	open-source software (C)
•	off-the-shelf components (electrodes, amplifier)
•	3D printed case
The interface integrates the prosthesis within the sensorimotor control-loop using muscle activity from an amputee's residual limb to control the AFP in real-time.

We developed a prototype of a fully autonomous smart thermostat that supports end-users in managing their heating preferences given real-time prices. It consists of the following:  a standard Horstmann thermostat; a Raspberry Pi, which is a pocket-sized computer on which a z-wave software transceiver is installed that enables communication between the Raspberry Pi and the Horstmann thermostat; a web application, which the user can use to remote-control the smart thermostat; and a web server.

UseInspired_Title:
The HSoundplane -- a musical interface prototype in the form of a haptic surface, originally developed during a related SNSF-funded project (CR21I2_150107) -- was further developed on the software side: sound and vibration synthesis engines were implemented.
The resulting device was then used in an experiment with musicians, aimed at testing how different types of vibrotactile feedback may affect the perceived quality of the device, the playing experience and the performance.
UseInspired_Type: Others (e.g. unlicensed products/procedures, prototypes, demonstrators, teaching materials)

UseInspired_Title:
The Touch-Box is a low-cost DIY interface which tracks the position of up to two fingers in contact with its top surface, measures their contact areas as well as 3D (normal and lateral) forces, and provides complex vibrotactile feedback.
An experiment was conducted with the device, which investigated how different gestures and vibrotactile feedback affect the accuracy of performing pitch bending actions towards a target.
UseInspired_Type: Others (e.g. unlicensed products/procedures, prototypes, demonstrators, teaching materials)

Development of a customized setup which allows the homogenous delivery by thoracoscopy of controlled laser light doses within the complex geometry of the chest cavity under sterile conditions. Four isotopic probes will allow real-time in situ light dosimetry at different locations of the cavity.

Le logiciel en ligne Qualtrics permet de créer des sondages et de les envoyer par email. Néanmoins, il reste difficile d'envoyer des sondages personnalisés par groupe d'individus répondant à un critère mesuré lors d'un sondage préliminaire. Nous avons développé une interface "Admin" qui permet de:
1. sélectionner les individus répondant à un critère mesuré au cours d'un sondage préliminaire Qualtrics et les intégrer dans une cohorte
2. envoyer à chaque cohorte un lien Qualtrics personnalisé

UseInspired_Title:
Development of an all-digital NMR spectrometer.

Building dedicated nuclear magnetic resonance (NMR) instrumentation implies high costs and signiﬁcant construction efforts. By using recent high-performance radio-processor devices, with embedded ﬁeld-programmable gate arrays (FPGAs), we could implement a novel type of spectrometer, able to meet (or exceed) the special demands of condensed matter NMR. Our novel FPGA-based design has 
met the interest of many scientists working in other areas.
